subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Johan Franzen scored the winning shootout goal in the fifth round of the tie breaker and Detroit snapped a three-game losing streak with a 5-4 victory against the host Columbus Blue Jackets.Also last night, Matt Foy scored for the first time in more than two years, and Aaron Voros and Brent Burns added goals for the second time in two games as the host Minnesota Wild defeated the Colorado Avalanche, 4-1. Vancouver defeated visiting Calgary, 4-1.
